definition: The word "aufwendig" refers to something that requires a significant amount of effort, time, or resources to accomplish. It is commonly used to describe tasks, projects, or activities that are complex, elaborate, or demanding in nature.

examples.german: Der Film war sehr aufwendig produziert.
examples.english: The film was produced with a lot of effort.

examples.german: Die Renovierung des Hauses war sehr aufwendig.
examples.english: The renovation of the house was very costly.

examples.german: Das Kleid ist sehr aufwendig verziert.
Die Vorbereitung f√ºr die Party war sehr aufwendig.
examples.english: The preparation for the party was very time-consuming.

examples.german: Die Reparatur des Autos war sehr aufwendig.
examples.english: The repair of the car was very expensive.
